Form a circle, or an agreed order of play.
Someone starts by stating a category. For example, 'Colours'.
The player to their right must respond with something which fits in that category. For example, 'Orange'.
Play continues with the next player stating a category that the previous word fits into. For example, 'Fruit'.
The game continues until someone is unable to say a category or response
After each round, mix the direction up to make it more interesting!
